Hear your tv better.

 

new

 
 
Bose tv speaker
 

For those “What did she just say?” or “I didn’t hear that. Can you rewind it?” moments, there’s the new Bose TV Speaker. It specifically focuses on enhancing dialogue and realism, so you can hear every word more clearly. Plus, Bluetooth® compatibility lets you wirelessly stream your favorite music or podcasts through the Bose TV Speaker. And designed with simplicity in mind, a one-connection setup has you watching news programs, talk shows, and so much more in no time.
